content.text: Here is a list of current veterinary job vacancies in the Civil Service. Click on the links to find out more. You may need to set up a username and password to access the details of each post.
For job alerts, sign up to Civil Service jobs website. Under job roles, select “Veterinary Services”.
You can find experiences from vets who have worked in these organisations, such the FSA, APHA and MoD as well as others, throughout the blog.
